attributes.action: Prevent the proposed green tax being imposed on the people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
They say we are to blame.... 
Global warming is only affected in a small part by peoples activity on earth. 
Its slightly more natural than 'they' lead us to believe. 
Do some research, its surprising.
 Why should we, THE PEOPLE pay for it?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
